mapper.select: SELECT DM.DOCUMENT_NUM AS dmNum, DM.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS dmTitle, DM.APPROVAL_CODE AS apCode, APS.APPROVAL_NAME AS apName, DM.DOCUMENT_CODE AS dmCode, DS.DOCUMENT_TITLE AS dmName, MM.ID AS dmWriteId, MM.NAME AS dmWriter, DM.DOCUMENT_DATE AS dmDate FROM DM INNER JOIN MM ON DM.WRITER = MM.ID AND DM.COMPANY_CODE = MM.COMPANY_CODE INNER JOIN APS ON DM.APPROVAL_CODE = APS.APPROVAL_CODE INNER JOIN DS ON DM.DOCUMENT_CODE = DS.DOCUMENT_CODE WHERE DM.COMPANY_CODE=#{cmCode} AND (DM.APPROVAL_CODE='C' OR DM.APPROVAL_CODE='R') ORDER BY DM.document_date DESC
